review: A fascinating and immersive read. The character development was excellent, and the plot twists kept me hooked till the end.
The book had a promising start, but the middle part dragged a bit. Still, the ending was satisfying.
An absolute masterpiece! The narrative was compelling, and the writing style was beautiful. Highly recommended.
The concept was interesting, but the execution left a lot to be desired. Some parts felt rushed and underdeveloped.
A solid read with a few minor flaws. The world-building was top-notch, but some characters felt one-dimensional.
